channel.title: New-Zealand-North on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in New-Zealand-North on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally available: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in a third Availability Zone in New Zealan North
item.description:
Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in a third Availability Zone in the New Zealand North region.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Red Hat OpenShift is now available in Malaysia West, New Zealand North, and Mexico Central
item.description:
Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO) is now generally available in three additional Azure regions: Malaysia West, New Zealand North, and Mexico Central.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure File Sync in New Zealand North
item.description:
Azure File Sync is now generally available in the New Zealand North region, enabling customers to tier data from on-premises Windows Servers to Azure Files for hybrid scenarios and simplified migration while preserving on-premises file server performance and compatibility.

  • Source: Azure Updates
